TopicTitle: Munar Orbit Periapsis Below Terrain Not Detected As Crash

Articles.Content:
Title says it all.  I've got a very low Munar orbit that has a periapsis below the terrain, but it's not being detected as a crash yet.  See email.

 

By the way, the issue with the orbit periapsis and apoapsis changing is still not fixed.  Periapsis goes down, apoapsis goes up.  Looks like an integrator issue to me, but I can't be sure.
I saw this today as well.
